price: Yeryüzünde böbürlenerek yürüme! Sen, ne yeri yarabilirsin ne de boyca dağlara erişebilirsin.
arabic: وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّكَ لَن تَخۡرِقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَن تَبۡلُغَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ طُولٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walā tamshi fī al-arḍi maraḥan innaka lan takhriqa al-arḍa walan tablugha al-jibāla ṭūlan
